hotels.name: Ambika Vilas, Trivandrum, ama Stays & Trails
hotels.description: Revel in the living heritage, Ambika Vilas, and live the authentic Kerela life in the calm courtyards and cool verandas.

hotels.name: Sluice House, Lonavala, ama Stays & Trails
hotels.description: Soak in gorgeous views of gardens in a sun-filled yard with a view of nature's best and dine under the stars treading a basket full of cherishable memories.

hotels.name: Rose Amer
hotels.description: Relive the rich cultural heritage at this 6-suite villa featuring a plush pool, block painting and pottery-making workshops, and a restaurant serving authentic Rajasthani cuisine.

hotels.name: StayVista | La Bougainvillea 5 BHK Villa
hotels.description: Located in Torda Goa, La Bougainvillea offers homely accommodations away from crowded beaches but within easy reach of Mandovi River and its casino ships.

hotels.name: Villa Siolim
hotels.description: Embrace the authentic Goan life and pamper yourself with a luxurious stay at the Pool Villa in Siolim that reflects Goan architecture.

hotels.name: Le Meridien
hotels.description: Experience Goa's rich art and culture at this five-star property located steps away from famous beaches and markets.

hotels.name: JW Marriott Hotel Kolkata
hotels.description: A 5-star hotel, JW Marriott is known for its warm hospitality, opulent amenities, luxe rooms and premium dining.

hotels.name: Taj Bengal
hotels.description: A pet-friendly property located at the heart of the city offering private dining options and fun activities for kids.

hotels.name: Taj Coromandel

hotels.name: Red Earth

hotels.name: Silver Sand Beach
hotels.description: Located by a stunning white sandy beach, the property boasts of luxe rooms, a multi-cuisine restaurant and a pub.

hotels.name: Radisson Blu Resort
hotels.description: Stay in a premium property located on the coastline and enjoy the best of the city and the serene beaches.

hotels.name: Caravela Beach Resort
hotels.description: Stay amid the soothing sound of waves crashing on the white sand beach right beside this scenic abode.

hotels.name: Hilton Goa Resort
hotels.description: Witness the scenic beauty at Hilton Goa, a hilltop resort overlooking lush greenery and the Nerul River.

hotels.name: Azaya Beach Resort
hotels.description: Experience luxury and tranquillity amid picturesque views of the sea in this Portuguese-inspired lavish abode.

hotels.name: The Moonlight Chalet
hotels.description: As the name suggests, you get to enjoy the stars from your bed. You'll love this unique and romantic escape which offers a beautiful view of the Parvati valley right from your bed.

hotels.name: Elgin Hall
hotels.description: Fancy a cup of tea with a relaxing stay? Book a stay at this boutique property that features luxe Victorian-inspired rooms and top leisure amenities.

hotels.description: JP Cordial is a contemporary, full service business hotel conveniently located in the heart of the financial and commercial district of Bengaluru on S C Road. The hotel is in close proximity to renowned corporate houses, information technology companies, public sector companies and banks.

hotels.name: Elite Park
hotels.description: ELITE PARK Hotel is located on Bannerghatta Main Road, just a 20-minute drive from Central Bangalore. The hotel features finer accommodation with modern amenities.

hotels.name: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton
hotels.description: Ideally located in the busy Commercial Business District of Sarjapur, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Bangalore is an upscale five-star hotel offering a well-equipped fitness centre, a temperature-controlled rooftop swimming pool and spa facilities.
